pages.text: Cosmilite is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Cosmilite can be obtained by crafting together cosmic scrap and gold ingots.$(br2)Stellar remnants can be found in a uniform pattern in the end, between Y=50 and Y=0.

pages.title: Cosmilite
pages.text: Cosmilite holds the power of the cosmos.
The smithing template drops from the Super Sniffer, and must be used on netherite to upgrade.
